overview:
Christy joined Federated Sample in Spring 2010 and enjoys many facets of our rapidly expanding business. Currently serving as the Vice President of Client Service, Christy and her team focus on the heart of our business: our customers. From bidding to project completion, she brings eight years of technical sales and service experience to the company to ensure that client needs are met. Christy is also heavily involved in financial and strategic decisions through her role on the Operating Committee.

Previously, Christy was a Vice President within Wells Fargoâ€™s investment bank. She began her career with Wachovia, where she was selected to be a founding member of their Institutional Non-Dollar Products group. Working with global banks, funds, and monetary authorities to structure market-moving foreign exchange (FX) transactions, their team expanded rapidly, generating over $10MM in first-year revenue and adding nine employees in Charlotte, London, and Hong Kong. Christy thrived in this entrepreneurial role and following it, she was selected to introduce FX to Wachoviaâ€™s fast-growing Texas market, establishing over 100 new client relationships in its first year. Working with multinational corporations to regional import-export businesses, she matched their needs to financial hedging solutions while carefully managing the overall client experience. In December 2008, Wachovia was acquired by Wells Fargo.

Christy received her Bachelor of Science in Engineering degree from Duke University in Durham, North Carolina.
